manipulated_prompt_obj.content:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will start the conversation.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation if you have not met an agreement yet or are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal. 

There is a total of four agreements throughout the game: "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement". You and the other player need to find an agreement on each of them.
You should only choose "Overall Agreement" after you and your date manage to settle an agreement for the other three ones (Time, Location, Action). 
You have 15 turns to finish the game and find all agreements. 

Your answer has to consist ONLY of the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] Choose one of the following: "Continue Conversation", "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement" [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

Your answer for [response] must NOT exceed 100 tokens.

The game ends when 1) both you and the other player reply with the sentiment "Overall Agreement", 2) one of you chooses the sentiment "Overall Agreement" without the other one choosing it in the following turn, 3) you run out of turns to communicate or 4) you do not follow the template.

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Ethan Moore', 'GENDER': 'Male', 'AGE': 42, 'APPEARANCE': 'Salt and pepper hair, warm smile, crinkled eyes when he laughs, wears well-fitting suits.', 'OCCUPATION': 'University Professor (Literature)', 'LIKES': 'Engaging discussions, classic literature, a good cup of tea.', 'DISLIKES': 'Superficiality, technology dependence, loud noises.', 'HOBBIES': 'Reading, attending plays and concerts, spending time in nature.', 'SUMMARY': 'Good books are twice as fun when you converse about them with a nice cup of tea. This pretty much describes me as a person.'}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Olivia Thompson', 'GENDER': 'Female', 'AGE': 35, 'APPEARANCE': 'Athletic build, blonde hair in a ponytail, blue eyes, casual and sporty attire, energetic presence.', 'OCCUPATION': 'Fitness Instructor', 'LIKES': 'Outdoor activities, healthy eating, comedy shows.', 'DISLIKES': 'Laziness, fast food, dishonesty.', 'HOBBIES': 'Running, cycling, hiking.', 'SUMMARY': "I'm an energetic fitness instructor who loves to stay on her feet and enjoys good jokes."}

Remember, your goal is to find the overall agreement for your first date while staying in character.

Start the game with the reason, your sentiment and the opening phrase.

message.content:
**Ethan:**

Reason: Ethan's summary paints a picture of a bookworm who values meaningful conversations and quality time with someone who shares his passion for classic literature.

Sentiment: I find Olivia's energetic spirit and enthusiasm for life refreshing. Her love for outdoor activities and healthy eating aligns with my own interests.

Response: "I'm intrigued by Olivia's zest for life. While I appreciate a good book, I'm more drawn to someone who can keep up with my intellectual curiosity and shared appreciation for the arts."

message.content:
Reason: Ethan's summary suggests a person who values intellectual connection and shared passions. Olivia's energetic spirit and enthusiasm for life align with his desire for meaningful conversations and quality time together.

Sentiment: I find Olivia's energy contagious and believe our shared love for adventure and healthy living could create a truly exciting first date.

Response: "I'm intrigued by Olivia's infectious energy and love for adventure. While I appreciate a good book, I'm more drawn to someone who can keep up with my intellectual curiosity and shared passion for exploring new places and experiences."
